ygData.subject: Re: Raid Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: I did look at the kitties on the way in. Looked promising. Might just get back my level with them. Barto ... quickly growing,  and starting to do Higher level
ygData.messageBody:
I did look at the kitties on the way in. Looked promising. Might just
get back my level with them.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., Toni <silly_girl4ever@y...> wrote:
>
> ********NEED HELP**********
> I need help from any of you High End gamers. My guild is
quickly growing, and starting to do Higher level raids. Many of our
members have not had much experience raiding, so we have been
doing "training" raids. We are still having people not listening,
and ending up causing TPW's. If any of you have any Guids to
raiding, and/or rules that your guild has, please send them to me
so I can design something tailored to my guild.
> Any personal advice is welcomed also.
> OH, Barto, you should try Iceclad Ocean on Velious, and fight
the cougars. Kat went from 32-37 there fighting the cougars, with
an added bonus that a cougar claw earring may drop form a few of them
=D
>
>
> Gwenevieve (soon to be Hartripper)
> 30 High Elf Cleric of
